about.subtitle: Software Engineer based in Brazil, specializing in both Front and Back-End development with a strong business background
about.rundown: I've cultivated a diverse portfolio of experience by collaborating with a variety of companies, continuously honing my skills, and collaborating with talented individuals. Here's a summary of my journey:

projects.introduction: Over the years, I've undertaken numerous projects, each holding a special place in my journey. Many of these endeavors are open-source, inviting you to delve into the codebase and share your insights for potential enhancements. Your collaboration is greatly appreciated and valued!

experience0.title: Founder and Data Analyst
experience0.point0: Develop and maintain web applications and apps using React and React Native
experience0.point1: Prospect and operate Influencer Marketing campaigns with top clients like GNT, Asics, Dafiti, Skechers and others
experience0.point2: Develop APIs to fetch data and analyse Influencer's key metrics

experience1.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
experience1.point0: Development of the investment platform and app Transfero Prime (React, .NET Core 5.0, C#)
experience1.point1: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products
experience1.point2: Development of the API and structure to process over $1 M a day in payments ( .NET and C#)
experience1.point3: Creation of a bot responsible for keeping track of various cryptocurrency prices (Python)

experience2.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience2.point0: Structure data on key metrics on Globo's products using SQL, Google Big Query and Python for the shareholders
experience2.point1: Study and propose new ideas to Globo using relevant behavioral and comparative data on all digital products (including G1, BBB, GE, GShow, Globoplay and more)
experience2.point2: Create jobs and processes to automate data visualization and fetching

experience3.title: Innovation Intern
experience3.point0: Presented a framework on how to deal with customers and the future of customer data using AI (Python)
experience3.point1: Showcased an MVP tailored for aggregating CS:GO match data and seamlessly integrating it into the broader esports landscape within the Globo ecosystem (Python)
